examples.example: 前方出现了微弱的信号，这给我们带来了新的希望。

translate.english: A faint signal appeared ahead, which brought us new hope.

examples.example: 我收到了朋友发来的信号，知道他一切都好，我很开心。

translate.english: I received the signal sent by my friend and knew that he was all right. I was very happy.

examples.example: 看到灯塔发出的信号，远航的船只找到了回家的方向，大家都欢呼起来。

translate.english: Seeing the signal emitted by the lighthouse, the oceangoing ship found the direction to go home, and everyone shouted excitedly.
